name: Cursed Mountain (itch) (Fermeco)
description:
Near an unknown village, there was a high mountain.
The legend said it was cursed so nobody could ever get to the top.
lately, this challenge atracted people all over the world.
Your job is to prevent this. You can use snowballs and avalanches to do this.

Defend the top of the mountain from climbers using snowballs and avalanches in this epic 2d game!
